doc.title: Animus
doc.plot: "Animus" is an abstract expression and exploration into the hysteria of self-hatred and the resulting violent acts of self-inflicted disfigurement. Though the source of the cannibalistic neurosis is not defined in the piece, it is implied by the carnal nature in the motion of the vignettes. The blurring and fading of the accelerated motion is present to connect the viewer to the dissociative and rabid state of mind in the character presented.
